**Air and Water Balancing Services**
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
----------------------

* Date of publication: January 15, 2024
* Tender closing date: February 13, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Solicitation number: 1000255793
* Amendment number: 4
* Reference number: CB-354-37087866

**Description of Services**
-------------------------

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a contractor to provide air and water balancing services for its group of sites in Winnipeg, Manitoba, including 1015 Arlington Street, 820 Elgin Avenue, and 745 Logan Avenue. The contractor will be responsible for balancing air and water systems to ensure optimal performance and quality.

**Start and End Dates**
----------------------

The contract period is expected to start on April 1, 2024, and end on March 31, 2029.

**Contractor Requirements**
-------------------------

* The contractor must be available to work on-site.
* Detailed requirements for the services to be provided are outlined in Annex A, Statement of Work.

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

* The contractor will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

* Canada

**Regions of Delivery**
---------------------

* Canada

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

* Name: Health Canada
* Address: 200 Eglantine Driveway, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9
* Contact: Jeremy Mallon, jeremy.mallon@hc-sc.gc.ca, (613) 371-3237

**Application**
--------------

Bid submissions should be in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender document. Bid documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29418/rfp-1000255793-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29418/rfp-1000255793-en.pdf) for English and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29418/rfp-1000255793-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29418/rfp-1000255793-fr.pdf) for French.
